name: VHS; Lovecore
description:
"Only in front of a camera can I be my true self!" 

You are given a strange VHS-tape by the shy first year student Sakura Suzuya who recently joined the school's photography-film club. Eagerly wanting to make acquaintances with you, but just WAY TOO SHY to speak to anyone directly, Sakura proposes a solution to this problem; you two simply communicate by exchanging VHS-tapes!

MULTIPLE ENDINGS! What you decide to show to Sakura WILL affect the story, just a little bit.

SUPER SHORT! A whopping ??? minutes worth of gameplay!
